mapper.insert: insert into lostFound (title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, lostfoundtype_id, user_id,type) VALUES (#{lostFound.title}, #{lostFound.img}, #{lostFound.pub_date}, #{lostFound.content}, #{lostFound.place}, #{lostFound.phone}, #{lostFound.state}, #{lostFound.stick}, #{lostFound.lostfoundtypeId}, #{lostFound.user_id},#{lostFound.type})
mapper.select: select * from lostFound where lostfoundtype_id = #{lostfoundtypeId} and state = '寻找中' or state='待认领' order by pub_date desc
select * from lostFound where user_id = #{user_id} order by pub_date desc
select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id from lostFound where state = '未找到'
select * from lostFound where stick = #{stick} and state = '寻找中' or state='待认领'
